item.title: Web701 0
item.description: Web Development 701 Web development is a required class for my major (software development) in the bachelor of IT. The 701 class is based around CMS (content management systems) frameworks, similar to websites like wordpress or wix. However, in this class we have to install and deploy a CMS framework. A CMS is essentially a platform which allows a user to change the website without touching any code, usually the form of drag and drops.
